description: Lossy compression algorithm for full color and grayscale continuous-tone images that employs discrete cosine transforms (DCT) and other processes, and encodes similar-positioned coefficients of all blocks in one action, followed by the next positioned coefficients of all blocks, etc.
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
name: ISO/IEC 10918-1:1994. Information technology -- Digital compression and coding of continuous-tone still images, progressive DCT-based (formal name); Progressive JPEG (common name)
